abstract: Barnes & Noble introduced its own electronic reader on Tuesday.
snippet: Barnes & Noble introduced its own electronic reader on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The Announcement is Over | 4:51 p.m.  “Ladies and gentlemen, the bar is now open.” The media is asked to remain for a Q and A session. We’ll have more for you later.

headline.main: Live Blog: Barnes & Noble Unveils E-Reader
